meta.description: Optimize the number of large and medium pizzas to minimize baking time while satisfying ingredient and demand constraints.

sets.name: PIZZA_SIZES
sets.description: Types of pizzas available at the restaurant.

params.name: dough_requirement
params.description: Units of dough required per pizza size.

params.name: topping_requirement
params.description: Units of toppings required per pizza size.

params.name: baking_time
params.description: Minutes required to bake each pizza size.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of pizzas to make for each size.

objective.name: min_total_baking_time
objective.description: Minimize the total baking time for all pizzas.

constraints.name: dough_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure at least 10000 units of dough are used.

constraints.name: topping_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure at least 4400 units of toppings are used.

constraints.name: medium_pizza_minimum
constraints.description: At least 200 medium pizzas must be made.

constraints.name: large_pizza_ratio
constraints.description: At least two times as many large pizzas should be made than medium pizzas.
